mapper.select: SELECT a.auth_detail_code AS authDetailCode, a.auth_detail_name AS authDetailName, a.auth_code AS authCode, b.auth_name AS authName, a.auth_detail_createdate AS authDetailCreatedate, b.auth_createdate AS authCreatedate FROM tb_sysauth_detail a INNER JOIN tb_sysauth b ON a.auth_code = b.auth_code
